page.title: 18Fishing
page.content: The Clovelly fishing work has gone down over the years.In Clovelly there are about 11 fishermen.The herring season is from October to January.The lobster and crab season is April to October .Most fishermen have other part time jobs.Some fishermen make lobster pots of willow & hazel.The famous Clovelly herring is not so abundant nowadays due to over fishing.There is a cold store in a disused lime kiln & the fish are kept on ice until market.Apart from swing nets which catch herrings & mackerel,some fishermen go trawling for plaice,sole ,hake ,cod,whiting,brill,turbot & ray.Fish is sold locally & Padstow.Some anglers fish from the harbour wall. There are occasional boat trips and competitions for anglers.
